name: Crazy Monster
description:
Crazy Monster

*brief introduction

A tower defense shooting game where players take on the role of a hero and defeat powerful and crazy monsters with their allies!

*Setting

The monsters have invaded our home, they are committing all sorts of crimes such as burning, killing, and looting. We cannot let them continue. We must stop the monsters and fight back!

*feature

You can defeat monsters with your superb combat power! Or strategize and use various defense towers and functional buildings in a reasonable manner to win step by step........

I hope you enjoy this game ^v^

After downloading "Crazy Monster", we will configure components for you for free, which can solve most startup problems that lack necessary game components
